Ingredients.4: 1 (8 ounce) package shredded Mexican cheese blend

Ingredients.9: 3 tablespoons sour cream, or to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).

Directions.2: Arrange waffle fries in a single layer on a rimmed baking sheet.

Directions.3: Bake in the preheated oven until light golden in color, 12 to 20 minutes.

Directions.4: Meanwhile, cook and stir ground beef in a large skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes. Drain excess grease. Stir in taco seasoning and cook for 1 to 2 minutes more.

Directions.5: Transfer baked fries to a 9x13-inch baking pan. Spread ground beef evenly over fries. Cover beef with cheese.

Directions.6: Return to the oven until cheese has melted, about 5 minutes.

Directions.7: Remove from the oven and garnish with tomatoes, olives, jalapenos, and lettuce. Dollop sour cream and guacamole on top.
